text: Charles Gordon (May 13, 1947 – October 31, 2020) was an American movie producer. His brother was movie producer Lawrence Gordon. He was born in Belzoni, Mississippi.Goldring/Woldenberg Institute of Southern Jewish Life: "Encyclopedia of Southern Jewish Communities - Belzoni, Mississippi" retrieved October 25, 2017 He was best known for producing Field of Dreams, Die Hard and The Rocketeer. Gordon died of cancer in Los Angeles on October 31, 2020 at the age of 73.Charles Gordon, Producer of 'Field of Dreams,' 'Die Hard' and 'Waterworld,' Dies at 73Charles Gordon, Oscar-Nominated Producer of ‘Field of Dreams’ and ‘Die Hard,’ Dies at 73 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles Category:Businesspeople from Mississippi
